original_text: You also had sex with the traders from Babylon. Like a prostitute, you sold yourself to more and more people. But they could still not make you happy.
korean_text: 장사하는 땅 갈대아에까지 심히 행음하되 아직도 족한 줄을 알지 못하였느니라

sentences.original_text: You also had sex with the traders from Babylon
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 또한 바빌론 상인들과 성관계를 가졌다

sentences.original_text: you sold yourself to more and more people
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 점점 더 많은 사람들에게 너 자신을 팔았다

sentences.original_text: But they could still not make you happy
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 여전히 너를 행복하게 만들 수 없었다
